document_data.caption: A map showing Beggars' Way in southwest Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Beggars' Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Beggars' Way''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Beggars' Way was located in the southwest corner of Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The road ran north to south, beginning along [[Nool Street]] in the north and passing south to end at [[Merchant Street]] near the outer wall. Beggars' Way was intersected by [[Fish Street (Zhentil Keep)|Fish Street]] and [[Pride Street]].
document_data.Notable Locations: A warehouse used exclusively by the [[Zhentarim]] and a [[Zhentilar]] barracks were located on Beggars' Way.
